Kyosho K03191A Mazda RX-3 1971 Fuji Masters 250km 4th Place Y. Terada

Purchased: 2014

This is the car Yojiro Terada drove to 4th place in the 1971 Fuji Masters 250km race.

(from Wikipedia - Yojiro Terada:)
Terada is known for holding the record for the most participations in the 24 Hour of Le Mans without winning - 29 (28 consecutive since 1974). He had better luck in the 24 Hours of Daytona with class wins on 2 occasions, including the RX-7's debut in 1979.
